Detailed Description

Represents a folder in the content library.

Represents a folder in the content library that holds DzContentFile objects as well as other DzContentFolder objects.

See also:
DzContentMgr::getContentDirectory(), DzContentMgr::getImportDirectory(), DzContentMgr::getPoserDirectory(), DzContentMgr::findBaseDirectory()

bool DzContentFolder::deleteFolder (  )  const [slot]

Removes this content folder. The default implementation of this function deletes all files and subfolders in this directory from the disk, so use with care!

Returns:
true if the file was removed successfully.

Emitted when the file list has changed.

bool DzContentFolder::filesNeedUpdate ( QStringList *  names = NULL  ) 

Internal use only - thread-safe function called by the framework to see if the files list needs to be refreshed.

Parameters:
names If not NULL, this list will be populated with the files in the diretory.
Returns:
true if an update is needed, otherwise false.
DzContentFolder::folderListChanged (  )  [signal]

Emitted when a folder is added or removed.

bool DzContentFolder::foldersNeedUpdate ( QStringList *  names = NULL  ) 

Internal use only - thread-safe function called by the framework to see if the sub-folders list needs to be refreshed.

Parameters:
names If not NULL, this list will be populated with the folders in the diretory.
Returns:
true if an update is needed, otherwise false.
